DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To compare efficacy safety Ahmed Glaucoma Valve ( AGV ) implantation superior versus inferior quadrant . Methods : In non-randomized clinical trial period two year , consecutive patient refractory glaucoma underwent AGV implantation superior inferior quadrant . Main outcome measure include best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) , number glaucoma medication , complication success rate ( define least 30 % IOP reduction preoperative value 5 < IOP < 22 mmHg without glaucoma medication ) . Other criteria failure include implant removal , additional glaucoma surgery , phthisis bulbi loss light perception .
